dict.string: Learn how to transfer your data.

You are about to save your game data. Once saved, all data will be <font color='yellow'>auto-saved</font>, removing the need to do it manually.
To save your data, you must have a <font color='yellow'>Google</font> account.
<font color='red'>CAUTION Polygons cannot be transferred between operating systems.</font>

Successfully logged in. From now on, your game data will be <font color='yellow'>saved automatically</font>. Data will be transferred via your Google account. Log in to your account from your new device, then load your play data.
For more details, see <font color='yellow'>How to Transfer Data</font>.

引き継ぎ ID・パスワードは すでに発行済みです。 再発行しますか？
<font color="red">＊ 注意 ＊ 再発行をすると今のパスワードは 使えなくなります。</font>

Game data for a different player has been found on this Google account.
<font color="yellow">Player name: %s Rank: %s</font>
Saving your current game data will cause any previous data to be lost.
Overwrite old data?
クラッシュフィーバー 引き継ぎ情報 アナタの引き継ぎ ID %s アナタのパスワード %s
ID・パスワードをコピーしました
クラッシュフィーバー引き継ぎ情報
クラッシュフィーバー 引き継ぎ情報 アナタの引き継ぎ ID %s アナタのパスワード %s
Learn how to transfer your data.

You are about to save your game data. Once saved, all data will be <font color='yellow'>auto-saved</font>, removing the need to do it manually.
To save your data, please press the button below to log in to your <font color='yellow'>Google Account</font>
<font color='red'>＊ Warning ＊ In the case that a different OS is used from changing your device and such, Polygons cannot be transferred due to Store policies. Other items shown in Items List, such as Mods, Lock Keys or Tickets, also cannot be transferred.</font>

Successfully logged in. From now on, your game data will be <font color='yellow'>saved automatically</font>. Data will be transferred via your Google account. Log in to your account from your new device, then load your play data.
For more details, see <font color='yellow'>How to Transfer Data</font>.

Successfully logged in. From now on, your game data will be <font color='yellow'>saved automatically</font>. Data will be transferred via your Apple account. Log in to your account from your new device, then load your play data.
For more details, see <font color='yellow'>How to Transfer Data</font>.

Game data for a different player has been found on this Google account.
<font color="yellow">Player name: %s Rank: %s</font>
Saving your current game data will cause any previous data to be lost.
Overwrite old data?

Player data is already registered with this account. <font color="yellow">Player name: %s Rank: %s</font> If you back up your progress with this account, the existing data will be overwritten. Continue with backup?

[Data Deletion] ※Warning※
In compliance with new app store regulations, you can now choose to delete your account.
After deleting your account, data cannot be recovered and app will be restored to the original state.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?

[Data Deletion] ※Warning※
Reminder. This action will not only delete the in-game temporary data but also the whole account data.
After deleting your account, the deletion is permanent and data cannot be recovered by any means.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?

[Data Deletion] ※Notice※
Your account has been deleted successfully. You have also been removed from friend lists and ranking quest records.
Click close to return to the title page.
